main.*:
[[File:CookieTribbiani.jpg|thumb|Cookie Tribbiani]]

'''Cookie Tribbiani''' is one of [[Joey Tribbiani|Joey]]'s [[Tribbiani Sisters|seven sisters]] and is the one who punches [[Chandler Bing|Chandler]] after he fails to recognize [[Mary-Angela|which sister]] he kissed at the party. 'Cookie' may just be a nickname. She makes her sole appearance in "[[The One Where Chandler Can't Remember Which Sister]]"''.''

She remarks to [[Phoebe Buffay|Phoebe]] that she shot her husband at some point in the past, although this could have just been to freak Phoebe out.

Cookie was portrayed by [[Alex Meneses]].
